snippet: Nonprofit organizations across the country are closely watching Maine as it considers becoming the first state to impose property taxes on hospitals, private colleges and summer camps.
lead_paragraph: Nonprofit organizations across the country are closely watching Maine as it considers becoming the first state to impose property taxes on hospitals, private colleges and summer camps.

headline.main: Maine Considers a Property Tax on Some Nonprofits
headline.print_headline: Nonprofits Protest a Tax On Property
